arm_group.description: Subjects will be dosed with a single oral 100 mg dose of [14C] GLPG0634 on one occasion

brief_summary.textblock:
This will be a study in 6 healthy male subjects, each receiving a single oral dose of 100 mg
      [14C]-radiolabeled GLPG0634.

      The study aims to establish the elimination pathways of GLPG0634 and their relative
      significance and to assess the metabolite profile of GLPG0634 in plasma and in excreta.

      Furthermore, the pharmacokinetics (PK) of the main metabolites in plasma relative to
      GLPG0634 will be evaluated.

      This study will also provide safety and tolerability information for GLPG0634.

clinical_study.brief_title: Investigation of the Pharmacokinetics and Metabolism of GLPG0634 in Healthy Male Subjects

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  male, between 40 and 65 years of age, inclusive

          -  within BMI range 18 to 30 kg/m2, inclusive

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Any condition that might interfere with the procedures or tests in this study

          -  Drug or alcohol abuse

          -  Smoking

intervention.description: Subjects will be dosed with a single oral 100 mg dose of [14C] GLPG0634 on one occasion

clinical_study.official_title: Investigation of the Pharmacokinetics and Metabolism of GLPG0634 in Healthy Male Subjects Following a Single Oral Administration of [14C] GLPG0634

oversight_info.authority: United Kingdom: Medicines and Healthcare Products Regulatory Agency

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the mass balance recovery of total radioactivity in urine, faeces, and urine and faeces combined to determine the elimination pathways and their relative significance after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634
primary_outcome.measure: The amount of total radioactivity in urine and faeces over time after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day -1 (pre-dosing) up to Day 10 post dosing

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the recovery of GLPG0634 and its main metabolites in urine and faeces after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634 to determine the elimination pathways and their relative significance (excretion and renal clearance)
primary_outcome.measure: The amount of GLPG0634 and its main metabolites in urine and faeces over time after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day -1 (pre-dosing) up to Day 10 post dosing

primary_outcome.description: Metabolite profiling and identification in plasma, urine and faeces over time after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634
primary_outcome.measure: Identification of metabolites over time in plasma, urine and faeces after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day -1 (pre-dosing) up to Day 10 post dosing

primary_outcome.description: To characterize the amount of radioactivity, GLPG0634 and its main metabolites in blood and plasma over time after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634
primary_outcome.measure: The amount of radioactivity, GLPG0634 and its main metabolites in blood and plasma over time after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dosing) up to Day 8 post dosing

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG0634 after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634 in terms of the number of adverse events reported
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to Day 10 post dosing

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG0634 after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634 in terms of changes in vital signs as measured by heart rate, blood pressure and oral temperature reported
secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in vital signs as measured by heart rate, blood pressure and oral temperature
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to Day 10 post dosing

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG0634 after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634 in terms of changes in 12-ECG measures reported
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to Day 10 post dosing

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG0634 after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634 in terms of changes in physical exam measures reported
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to Day 10 post dosing

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG0634 after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634 in terms of changes in blood safety lab parameters reported
secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in blood safety lab parameters
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to Day 10 post dosing

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG0634 after a single dose of radiolabeled GLPG0634 in terms of changes in urine safety lab parameters reported
secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in urine safety lab parameters
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening up to Day 10 post dosing
